person.persName: Thomas B. Wadlington (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Wadlington. Father of William J. Wadlington. Married to Mary A. J. Cartwright Wadlington in Caldwell County, Kentucky on December 21, 1850. Father of Thomas Wadlington, Mary Wadlington, and Ann Wadlington. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer and convict in Caldwell County in 1860. Convicted of the murder of Milton A. Cartwright in Caldwell County in 1860.
